summary: AN ORDINANCE providing for the acquisition by condemnation of certain property and property rights in a portion of Southern Pacific Addition to West Seattle, Cottage Grove Addition No. 3, Southern Pacific Supplemental Addition to West Seattle, Cottage Grove Addition No. 3, Southern Pacific Supplemental Addition to West Seattle, and Faegere's 1st Addition to West Seattle required for addition and betterments (21st Avenue Southwest, et al, Sanitary Sewers, L.I.D. 6658, Ordinance 104715) to the existing Municipal Sewerage Utility as contemplated by Ordinance 99997 and providing payment therefor.
